exec: pm.test("Should update profile from CIRA to TLS mode 2", function () {

body.raw:
{
        "profileName": "testTLS",
        "activation": "ccmactivate",
        "ciraConfigName": null,
        "generateRandomPassword": true,
        "generateRandomMEBxPassword": true,
        "tags": [
            "tag1"
        ],
        "dhcpEnabled": true,
        "tlsMode": 2,
        "userConsent": "All",
        "iderEnabled": false,
        "kvmEnabled": true,
        "solEnabled": false,
        "tenantId": "",
        "version": "{{testTLSVersion}}",
        "wifiConfigs": []
    }
